subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson said the team’s defense in the fourth quarter of Saturday’s victory against the Celtics was the best performance in a quarter this season. The Celtics were held to 8 points.
snippet: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson said the team’s defense in the fourth quarter of Saturday’s victory against the Celtics was the best performance in a quarter this season. The Celtics were held to 8 points.
